TopicTitle: Set 9 Satellites and return to Kerbin Runway

Articles.Content:
This is my first Craft Designed for Re-entry, while working on this project I was having Overheating Problems on Re-entry and found some help on the Forums to make this project a success. The Thermal Control Systems were not necessary and were removed. The Craft is called Space Tech Sat-9, It is capable of deploying 9 Satellites from it's tail end into orbit and return to base by Runway. Deploying the Satellites was a real treat when watching them drift out of the structural work. Hope you enjoy it as much as I have. Craft File [Space Tech Sat-9](https://files.secureserver.net/0subYQswXZHjeL) ![p>

July 28, 2015 by castille7** Title Change
